note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
## Layarizar - http://geekia.es

Gestor de puntos POI (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_of_interest) especialmente preparado para usar con capas Layar (http://www.layar.com)

Servidor de Puntos de Interes Layar (POI):
Porpoise - http://code.google.com/p/porpoise/

Plugin externo:
Uploader - https://github.com/milesj/cake-uploader
name: Layarizar
tagline: Gestor de puntos POI, especial para Layar, bajo CakePHP
